description:
Completely Uninstall Unwanted Software, Windows Apps & Browser Plug-ins

IObit Uninstaller is a powerful tool designed to thoroughly remove unwanted programs, browser plug-ins, and Windows apps. It ensures a clean and smooth PC by detecting and uninstalling stubborn software and associated files. With features like batch uninstallation, software health management, and browser protection, IObit Uninstaller enhances system performance and security.
v15.1 (2025-10-22)
- Improved Stubborn Program Remover to detect programs with uninstall issues more accurately
- Expanded database to remove 18% more malicious/ads plugins for faster and more secure browsing
- Fixed all known bugs
